com.marklogic.hub.step

Interface StepRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueryStepRunner, WriteStepRunner

    public interface StepRunner
    Executes a step with options

        Sets the source client on the step runner. The source client determines which database to run against for building the envelope.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the step runner object

      • awaitCompletion

        void awaitCompletion(long timeout,
                     java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                     java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Blocks until the step execution is complete.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted while waiting
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - if times out

      • run

        RunStepResponse run()
        Runs the flow and creates the job
        Returns:
        RunStepResponse object for the flow that is run

      • run

        RunStepResponse run(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> uris)
        Runs the flow and creates the job. This bypasses the collector
        Parameters:
        uris - the ids to pass to the harmonization flow
        Returns:
        RunStepResponse object for the flow that is run

        void stop()
        Stops the step run
